rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with Scandinavian minimalist design elements and natural materials for a welcoming atmosphere.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-concept living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and expansive views. Incorporates modern Scandinavian aesthetics with neutral tones and functional furnishing.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room offering a seamless dining space that maintains the minimalist style typical of Scandinavian design.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private master bedroom designed with ample storage and built-in closets. The decor includes subtle natural elements and warm lighting to ensure a restful atmosphere. Vastu principles are considered by positioning the bed in an auspicious direction.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room that retains Scandinavian simplicity with functional space planning and built-in furniture.

rooms.name: Home Office / Study
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace that harmonizes modern minimalist design and natural light. It is strategically placed to optimize the flow of energy according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Fully equipped private gym with high ceilings and floor-to-ceiling windows that offer a refreshing atmosphere and plenty of natural light. Design incorporates Scandinavian simplicity and functional layout.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A compact yet sophisticated home theater with acoustically treated interiors for optimal viewing and sound experience. The design integrates Scandinavian aesthetics while ensuring privacy and functionality.

openings.name: Front Entrance
openings.description: Double-glazed front door with a welcoming glass panel to enhance natural lighting and security. Compliant with local building norms.

openings.name: Staircase Access
openings.description: Ergonomic staircase designed for safe vertical circulation between the ground floor and upper level, adhering to Vastu principles regarding directional flow and energy balance.

openings.name: Balcony/Veranda
openings.description: Open balcony area that provides additional outdoor living space. Incorporates Scandinavian design with simple, clean lines and functional seating options.

rooms.name: Second Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional master bedroom designed with Scandinavian minimalism and ample natural light. The layout is optimized for Vastu compliance.

rooms.name: Balcony Suite
rooms.description: Cozy suite that opens to a private balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows offering panoramic views and ensuring energy flow as per Vastu principles.

openings.name: Upper Staircase Access
openings.description: Well-designed staircase connecting the upper floor to the ground level, ensuring safe and efficient vertical circulation in line with Vastu guidelines.
